## FlowContent.append() method

Appends the specified nodes

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nodes | readonly [FlowNode](./scribing.flownode.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The nodes to be appended |
